plot outline: Desa dimmari is a story about the forbidden love that can only be known between a brother and sister. A secret kept in a family that is driven by an overwhelming need to maintain image in a society that forbids brotherly love. A father who's own secret is enough to bring down the family empire and a mother that is driven to keep her place as prime minister of a country torn by minstrel bloodied war.
title: Desa dimmari
